frames.caption: The image depicts an ancient Egyptian tomb, dimly lit by a torch held by a person. The room is adorned with hieroglyphics and statues, with a sarcophagus prominently placed in the center.
frames.description: The scene is set in an ancient Egyptian tomb, characterized by intricate carvings and statues. The atmosphere is mysterious and historical, with a focus on the central sarcophagus.

frames.caption: A dimly lit room features ancient hieroglyphics on the wall, partially illuminated by a warm light. A person with long dark hair stands in the foreground, facing away from the camera, while a statue is visible in the background.
frames.description: The scene is set in an ancient or historical setting, possibly a tomb or temple, with hieroglyphics and a statue suggesting an Egyptian theme. The lighting is low, creating a mysterious and contemplative atmosphere.
